actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the granting of mineral rights to certain homestead patentees who were wrongfully deprived of such rights.

summary.text: Authorizes the granting of mineral rights by the Secretary of the Interior to eligible homestead patentees who were wrongfully deprived of such rights.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the granting of mineral rights to certain homestead patentees who were wrongfully deprived of such rights.
